options.json: {"columns":[{"title":"名称","dataIndex":"title","key":"title","width":"30%"},{"title":"数值","dataIndex":"number","key":"number","width":"30%"},{"title":"状态","dataIndex":"status","key":"status","width":"30%"}],"dataSource":[{"title":"这是 FF 评价设计好坏的内在标准。基于「每个人都追求快乐工作」这一假定，我们在「确定性」和「自然」的基础上，新增「意义感」和「生长性」两个价值观，指引每个设计者做更好地判断和决策。","number":"数值1","status":"状态1"},{"title":"标题2","number":"数值2","status":"状态2"},{"title":"标题3","number":"数值3","status":"状态3"},{"title":"标题4","number":"数值4","status":"状态4"},{"title":"标题5","number":"数值5","status":"状态5"},{"title":"标题6","number":"数值6","status":"状态6"},{"title":"标题7","number":"数值7","status":"状态7"},{"title":"标题8","number":"数值8","status":"状态8"},{"title":"标题9","number":"数值9","status":"状态9"},{"title":"标题10","number":"数值10","status":"状态10"},{"title":"标题11","number":"数值11","status":"状态11"},{"title":"标题12","number":"数值12","status":"状态12"},{"title":"标题13","number":"数值13","status":"状态13"},{"title":"标题14","number":"数值14","status":"状态14"},{"title":"标题15","number":"数值15","status":"状态15"},{"title":"标题16","number":"数值16","status":"状态16"},{"title":"标题17","number":"数值17","status":"状态17"},{"title":"标题18","number":"数值18","status":"状态18"},{"title":"标题19","number":"数值19","status":"状态19"},{"title":"标题20","number":"数值20","status":"状态20"}]}
